column4: well, i have ubuntu installed.  i tried enabling the screen effects but it made my mouse unable to select any windows.  somebody here suggested installing compiz fusion instead.  i did that and now i still can't select windows and to top it off i have the compiz-core in my update manager and it wont go away no matter how many times i update it
all seems pretty newbish, but wtf, i gotta be a newb
are the window decorations missing (ie window borders etc)
when I first installed compiz I had no window borders and couldnt move windows etc. Hit alt+F2 and run this compiz --replace -c emerald &
